(Unitron and Shockwave are a few hundred feet in the air and it would be easy 
for them to see someone jumping at them with a sword.

And Deadeye Duck owns Bucky O'Hare.  What was the name of that cool robot who 
worked for the Toadies?)

Shockwave/Unitron:



"All are inferior to Decepticons.  They cannot defeat eons of experience."

After Shockwave stated that simple fact loud enough for anyone to hear, the 
space fighter that was his current mode did some sharp maneuvers, avoiding 
the missiles, but three of Hot Rod's lasers dug into his left wing, not 
piercing it though.  He returned fire wtih two missiles, splitting apart, one 
heading for Windlord and the other for Train Wreck.

---

Unitron avoided the missiles relatively easily, some shrapnel digging into 
his back fins but it wasn't to bad.  He was able to easily avoid the incoming 
robot, Aerotaur, but two of the robot's lasers struck his space fighter form 
in the side, barely missing some vital parts.

"Maximal filth." he cursed, firing off fifteen rapid lasers at Hot Rod and 
making a u-turn in the air that put some pressure on his engines, launching 
off a missile at Aerotaur as he adjusted his course so he was no longer 
flying towards him.

"Shall I call the Ramora for aid?" Unitron asked via comm. with Shockwave.

"Unneccessary.  We shall contact Firestarter only when he is needed."
